member.name: D2D1_INPUT_ELEMENT_DESC
member.summary: A description of a single element to the vertex layout.

member.name: D2D1_INPUT_ELEMENT_DESC.semanticName
member.summary: The HLSL semantic associated with this element in a shader input-signature.

member.name: D2D1_INPUT_ELEMENT_DESC.semanticIndex
member.summary: The semantic index for the element. A semantic index modifies a semantic, with an integer index number. A semantic index is only needed in a case where there is more than one element with the same semantic. For example, a 4x4 matrix would have four components each with the semantic name matrix; however, each of the four components would have different semantic indices (0, 1, 2, and 3).

member.name: D2D1_INPUT_ELEMENT_DESC.format
member.summary: The data type of the element data.

member.name: D2D1_INPUT_ELEMENT_DESC.inputSlot
member.summary: An integer value that identifies the input-assembler. Valid values are between 0 and 15.

member.name: D2D1_INPUT_ELEMENT_DESC.alignedByteOffset
member.summary: The offset in bytes between each element.
